idea-plugin.name: CodeNarc
idea-plugin.description: CodeNarc analyzes Groovy code for defects, bad practices, inconsistencies, style issues and more. A flexible framework for rules, rulesets and custom rules means it's easy to configure CodeNarc to fit into your project. Build tool, framework support, and report generation are all enterprise ready.
